ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعَ طَرَآئِقَ وَمَا كُنَّا عَنِ ٱلْخَلْقِ غَٰفِلِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We created above you seven levels and We were not unaware of the creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We made several highways one over the other above you. We are not neglectful of creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We have indeed fashioned above you seven paths. Never were We unaware of the task of creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have created seven heavens above you and have never been neglectful to Our Creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We have created seven paths above you; and We are not unmindful of the creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We have created above you seven Tara'iq, and We are never unaware of the creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We made above you seven heavens; and never are We heedless of creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We created above you seven ways, and We were not heedless of creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We have created above you seven paths, and We are never unmindful of creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have created seven paths above you; We have never been unmindful of Our creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We created above you seven paths, and of the creation We have not been neglectful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We created above you seven levels and We have not been oblivious of the creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We have made, above you, seven tracts; and We are never unmindful of (our) Creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We have created above you seven heavens (one over the other), and We are never unaware of the creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We have created seven ways above you; of Our creation, We are never inattentive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We created above you seven pathways, and We are never heedless of the creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We have created above you seven layered heavens, and never have We been of [Our] creation unaware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:17] And verily We created above you seven paths, that is, [seven] heavens (tarā’iq is the plural of tarīqa [so called] because they are the paths used by the angels) and of creation, that lies beneath these [paths], We are never unmindful, lest these should fall upon them and destroy them. Nay, but We hold them back, as [stated] in the verse: And He holds back the heaven lest it should fall upon the earth [Q. 22:65].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We have created above you seven paths) seven heavens, some above others like a dome, (and We are never unmindful of creation) leaving them without commands and prohibitions.
